cause.description:
Share Our Strength's Great American Bake Sale is a national campaign where participants host their own bake sale anywhere in the U.S. from May 19 - August 31 and send their proceeds to Share Our Strength to help organizations in their community end childhood hunger.
Since 2003, this campaign has raised over $3 million and engaged more than 1 million people in baking, selling or buying goods.
To get involved or register to hold a bake sale, log onto www.greatamericanbakesale.org
1. Hunger is a problem in America
2. Every fourth person standing in a soup kitchen is a child
3. More than 12 million children are at risk of hunger in America
4. Hunger impedes children's growth, development and academic performance
